com.db4o.constraints
Class UniqueFieldValueConstraint

java.lang.Object
  com.db4o.constraints.UniqueFieldValueConstraint
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConfigurationItem
public class UniqueFieldValueConstraint
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConfigurationItem

Configures a field of a class to allow unique values only. In C/S mode, this configuration should be set on the server side only.

Constructor Summary

          constructor to create a UniqueFieldValueConstraint.
